content.Description: Optional prefix to add to table names
Maximum size of batches when records are streamed in. BATCH messages are not affected by this property.
Maximum time in minutes between state messages when records are streamed in. BATCH messages are not affected by this property.
Add Singer Data Capture (SDC) metadata to records
Default partition column for all streams
If tables should be truncated before new data is loaded
Only append data; don't overwrite existing data
Stream specific configs. Like partition keys.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
